title: Good Morning Bedlam

banner_image.name: Padre_GMB_web
banner_image.alt: Padre Hotel: illustration with mic and ticket that reads "Padre Hotel welcomes Good Morning Bedlam"

description:
The Padre Hotel welcomes the band Good Morning Bedlam to the Prairie Fire patio on October 30th for a free show. Enjoy drinks and tunes on the patio from 7:30-9:30pm.

About the Band:
Good Morning Bedlam has become an innovative force in the midwest folk scene and beyond with 8 national tours in over 27 states. Their shows are known for their contagious energy, with members careening about the stage, jumping and dancing with a wild playfulness. With tight soaring three part harmonies, and thumping kick-drum, they captivate their audience night after night with no intention of slowing down. Every song is a unique twist on what is generally dubbed as folk music.
short_description: The Padre Hotel welcomes the band Good Morning Bedlam to the Prairie Fire patio on October 30th for a free show. Enjoy drinks and tunes on the patio from 7:30-9:30pm.
